metadata.title: CVE-2017-11521 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The SdpContents::Session::Medium::parse function inresip/stack/SdpContents.cxx in reSIProcate 1.10.2 allows remote attackersto cause a denial of service (memory consumption) by triggering many mediaconnections.

criterions.comment: resiprocate: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
